titleStmt.title: By the Lord Protector. A proclamation of his Highnes, with the consent of his Council, for continuing all persons being in office for the execution of publike justice at the time of the late change of government until his Hignes further direction.
Proclamations. 1653-12-21
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Lord Protector (1653-1658 : O. Cromwell)

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Henry Hills, printer to his Highness the Lord Protector,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: White-Hall this 21. of December, in the year of our Lord 1653.
Arms 48; Steele notation: Eng- doth them.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
